entry.summary:
RT Coinvise MEME CONTEST 🎉 Create a meme related the token launch of Developer DAO, and win some $CODE 😍 1. Follow @developer_dao 2. RT the first tweet of the thread below 3. Reply your meme in the first tweet of the thread below & drop your ENS.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): In celebration of our highly anticipated $CODE token launch, we're kicking off our first-ever MEME CONTEST, powered by @CoinviseCo 🎉 🎉 How will it work? Create a meme related the token launch of Developer DAO, and stand a chance of winning $CODE tokens 👀 Go go go 🔥 🔥

entry.title: Make sure you’re stepping away from your machines, and going out to get some fresh air. And be sure to grab a snack, drink plenty of water, and have ...
entry.summary: Make sure you’re stepping away from your machines, and going out to get some fresh air. And be sure to grab a snack, drink plenty of water, and have human interactions outside of tech and web3. These are important and good for you 🙂 Have a good weekend, folks
